question: Which company announced that, it has commissioned world's largest refinery off-gas cracker at Jamnagar?
explanation: Reliance Industries Ltd (RIL) announced that, it has commissioned and achieved design throughput of the world's largest refinery off the gas cracker at Jamnagar. RIL stated that, this refinery will have a capacity of 1.5 million tonnes per annum along with downstream plants and utilities. The facility uses off-gases from two refineries of RIL at Jamnagar as feedstock. This will enable sustainable cost reduction.
